doc:
Jeff Bridges https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jeff_Bridges 0 Jeffrey Leon Bridges (born December 4, 1949) is an American actor, singer, and producer. He comes from a prominent acting family and appeared on the television series Sea Hunt (1958–60) with his father Lloyd Bridges and brother Beau Bridges. He won the Academy Award for Best Actor for the 2009 film Crazy Heart and earned Academy Award nominations for his roles in six other films. Jeffrey_Leon_Bridges ( born December_4_,_1949 ) is an_American_actor , singer , and producer . He comes from a_prominent_acting_family and appeared on the_television_series_Sea_Hunt_(_1958 – 60_) with his_father_Lloyd_Bridges and brother_Beau_Bridges . He won the_Academy_Award for_Best_Actor for the_2009_film_Crazy_Heart and earned Academy_Award_nominations for his_roles in six_other_films .
